name: Love Love Joe Biden: The Joe Biden Dating Simulator
name_original: Love Love Joe Biden: The Joe Biden Dating Simulator
description:
"Ice Cream!"

The presidency is in the past, and a new chapter is ahead for Joe... Will you be in it? The retirement home is a magical place, but it isn't without conflict! Ice cream isn't always available, and you may find yourself caught in the middle of a conspiracy...

Features

  • Ice Cream! 🍦
  • Romanceable Joe Biden 💕
  • Gilfs 👵
  • Big Wolf-men 😏

Gameplay

This game is a dialogue-driven visual novel where your choices matter! You only need one hand to click through the game 😏, as it's a classic visual novel. Like all visual novels, you can use just about any mouse on the market to click the left mouse button to progress the story and continue the dialogue and narration. Don't click too willy-nilly, though, you might regret your choices!

Future Plans


This is only the beginning! Stay tuned for upcoming DLC releases and, depending on your feedback, new episodes to the Love Love Joe Biden Saga!
